playn.core

Interface Pointer.Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Pointer.Adapter
    Enclosing interface:
    Pointer

    public static interface Pointer.Listener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPointerCancel(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when a drag is canceled (always after start and takes the place of end).
      void onPointerDrag(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when the pointer drags (always between start/end events).
      void onPointerEnd(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when the pointer event ends.
      void onPointerStart(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when the pointer event starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onPointerStart

        void onPointerStart(Pointer.Event event)
        Called when the pointer event starts.

      • onPointerEnd

        void onPointerEnd(Pointer.Event event)
        Called when the pointer event ends.

      • onPointerDrag

        void onPointerDrag(Pointer.Event event)
        Called when the pointer drags (always between start/end events).

      • onPointerCancel

        void onPointerCancel(Pointer.Event event)
        Called when a drag is canceled (always after start and takes the place of end). This happens when Pointer.cancelLayerDrags() is called, or it can be initiated by the OS. Note: the coordinates of this event will be (0, 0) if initiated by Pointer.cancelLayerDrags().
